as.command.set_item: Set the stack size of %s to %s (Default: %s)
as.command.reset_item: The stack size of %s has been reset
as.command.reset_all: All items' stack size has been reset
as.command.error_empty_hand: %s has nothing on the main hand!
as.command.set_matched: Set the stack size of %s item(s) to %s (%s: %s)
